trans-unit.source: ATA update to 1.6 migration guide | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: ATA update to 1.6 migration guide | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Procedures to update ATA to version 1.6
trans-unit.target: Procedures to update ATA to version 1.6

trans-unit.source: ATA update to 1.6 migration guide
trans-unit.target: ATA update to 1.6 migration guide

trans-unit.source: The update to ATA 1.6 provides improvements in the following areas:
trans-unit.target: The update to ATA 1.6 provides improvements in the following areas:

trans-unit.source: New detections
trans-unit.target: New detections

trans-unit.source: Improvements to existing detections
trans-unit.target: Improvements to existing detections

trans-unit.source: The ATA Lightweight Gateway
trans-unit.target: The ATA Lightweight Gateway

trans-unit.source: Automatic updates
trans-unit.target: Automatic updates

trans-unit.source: Improved ATA Center performance
trans-unit.target: Improved ATA Center performance

trans-unit.source: Lower storage requirements
trans-unit.target: Lower storage requirements

trans-unit.source: Support for IBM QRadar
trans-unit.target: Support for IBM QRadar

trans-unit.source: Updating ATA to version 1.6
trans-unit.target: Updating ATA to version 1.6

trans-unit.source: If ATA is not installed in your environment, download the full version of ATA which includes version 1.6 and follow the standard installation procedure described in [Install ATA](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/install-ata).
trans-unit.target: If ATA is not installed in your environment, download the full version of ATA which includes version 1.6 and follow the standard installation procedure described in [Install ATA](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/install-ata).

trans-unit.source: If you already have ATA version 1.5 deployed, this procedure will walk you through the steps necessary to update your deployment.
trans-unit.target: If you already have ATA version 1.5 deployed, this procedure will walk you through the steps necessary to update your deployment.

trans-unit.source: You cannot install ATA version 1.6 directly on top of ATA version 1.4.
trans-unit.target: You cannot install ATA version 1.6 directly on top of ATA version 1.4.

trans-unit.source: You must install ATA version 1.5 first.
trans-unit.target: You must install ATA version 1.5 first.

trans-unit.source: If you accidentally attempted to install ATA 1.6 without installing ATA 1.5, you will get an error telling you that **A newer version is already installed on your machine.**
trans-unit.target: If you accidentally attempted to install ATA 1.6 without installing ATA 1.5, you will get an error telling you that **A newer version is already installed on your machine.**

trans-unit.source: You must uninstall the remnants of ATA 1.6 that will remain on your computer - even though the installation failed - before you install ATA version 1.5.
trans-unit.target: You must uninstall the remnants of ATA 1.6 that will remain on your computer - even though the installation failed - before you install ATA version 1.5.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to update to ATA version 1.6:
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps to update to ATA version 1.6:

trans-unit.source: To avoid upgrade issues, make sure you follow steps 8 to 10 of **Migration failure when updating to ATA version 1.6** described in [What's new in ATA version 1.6](whats-new-version-1.6.md).
trans-unit.target: To avoid upgrade issues, make sure you follow steps 8 to 10 of **Migration failure when updating to ATA version 1.6** described in [What's new in ATA version 1.6](whats-new-version-1.6.md).

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have the necessary free space to complete the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have the necessary free space to complete the upgrade.

trans-unit.source: You can perform the installation up to the readiness check to get an estimate of how much free space is needed, and then restart the upgrade after allocating the necessary disk space.
trans-unit.target: You can perform the installation up to the readiness check to get an estimate of how much free space is needed, and then restart the upgrade after allocating the necessary disk space.

trans-unit.source: Download update 1.6
trans-unit.target: Download update 1.6

trans-unit.source: In this version of, the same installation file (Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe) is used for installing a new deployment of ATA and for upgrading existing deployments.
trans-unit.target: In this version of, the same installation file (Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe) is used for installing a new deployment of ATA and for upgrading existing deployments.

trans-unit.source: Update the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Update the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Download the updated ATA Gateway package
trans-unit.target: Download the updated ATA Gateway package

trans-unit.source: Update the ATA Gateways
trans-unit.target: Update the ATA Gateways

trans-unit.source: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.
trans-unit.target: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Update the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Update the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Back up your database: (optional)
trans-unit.target: Back up your database: (optional)

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Center is running as a virtual machine and you want to take a checkpoint, shut the virtual machine down first.
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Center is running as a virtual machine and you want to take a checkpoint, shut the virtual machine down first.

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Center is running on a physical server, follow the recommended procedure to [back up MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.org/manual/core/backups/).
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Center is running on a physical server, follow the recommended procedure to [back up MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.org/manual/core/backups/).

trans-unit.source: Run the installation file, Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe, and follow the instructions on the screen to install the update.
trans-unit.target: Run the installation file, Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe, and follow the instructions on the screen to install the update.

trans-unit.source: ATA 1.6 requires .Net Framework 4.6.1 to be installed.
trans-unit.target: ATA 1.6 requires .Net Framework 4.6.1 to be installed.

trans-unit.source: If not already installed, ATA installation will install .Net Framework 4.6.1 as part of the installation
trans-unit.target: If not already installed, ATA installation will install .Net Framework 4.6.1 as part of the installation

trans-unit.source: The installation of .Net Framework 4.6.1 may require restarting the server.
trans-unit.target: The installation of .Net Framework 4.6.1 may require restarting the server.

trans-unit.source: ATA installation will proceed only after the server was restarted.
trans-unit.target: ATA installation will proceed only after the server was restarted.

trans-unit.source: On the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Read the End User License Agreement and if you accept the terms, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Read the End User License Agreement and if you accept the terms, click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: It is now possible to use Microsoft Update for ATA to remain up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: It is now possible to use Microsoft Update for ATA to remain up-to-date.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Update page, select **Use Microsoft Update when I check for updates (recommended)**.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Update page, select **Use Microsoft Update when I check for updates (recommended)**.

trans-unit.source: Keep ATA up to date image](media/ata_ms_update.png) This will adjust the Windows settings to enable updates for other Microsoft products (including ATA), as seen here.
trans-unit.target: Keep ATA up to date image](media/ata_ms_update.png) This will adjust the Windows settings to enable updates for other Microsoft products (including ATA), as seen here.

trans-unit.source: Windows auto-update image
trans-unit.target: Windows auto-update image

trans-unit.source: Before installation begins, ATA will perform a readiness check.
trans-unit.target: Before installation begins, ATA will perform a readiness check.

trans-unit.source: Review the results of the check to make sure the prerequisites are configured successfully and that you have the at least the minimum amount of disk space.
trans-unit.target: Review the results of the check to make sure the prerequisites are configured successfully and that you have the at least the minimum amount of disk space.

trans-unit.source: ATA readiness check image
trans-unit.target: ATA readiness check image

trans-unit.source: Click **Update**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Update**.

trans-unit.source: After you click Update, ATA is offline until the update procedure is complete.
trans-unit.target: After you click Update, ATA is offline until the update procedure is complete.

trans-unit.source: After updating the ATA Center, the ATA Gateways will report that they are now outdated.
trans-unit.target: After updating the ATA Center, the ATA Gateways will report that they are now outdated.

trans-unit.source: Outdated gateways image
trans-unit.target: Outdated gateways image

trans-unit.source: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.
trans-unit.target: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.

trans-unit.source: Step 2.
trans-unit.target: Step 2.

trans-unit.source: Download the ATA Gateway setup package
trans-unit.target: Download the ATA Gateway setup package

trans-unit.source: After configuring the domain connectivity settings, you can download the ATA Gateway setup package.
trans-unit.target: After configuring the domain connectivity settings, you can download the ATA Gateway setup package.

trans-unit.source: To download the ATA Gateway package:
trans-unit.target: To download the ATA Gateway package:

trans-unit.source: Delete any previous versions of the ATA Gateway package you previously downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Delete any previous versions of the ATA Gateway package you previously downloaded.

trans-unit.source: On the ATA Gateway machine, open a browser and enter the IP address you configured in the ATA Center for the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: On the ATA Gateway machine, open a browser and enter the IP address you configured in the ATA Center for the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: When the ATA Console opens, click on the settings icon and select **Configuration**.
trans-unit.target: When the ATA Console opens, click on the settings icon and select **Configuration**.

trans-unit.source: Configuration settings icon
trans-unit.target: Configuration settings icon

trans-unit.source: In the **ATA Gateways** tab, click **Download ATA Gateway Setup**.
trans-unit.target: In the **ATA Gateways** tab, click **Download ATA Gateway Setup**.

trans-unit.source: Save the package locally.
trans-unit.target: Save the package locally.

trans-unit.source: The zip file includes the following:
trans-unit.target: The zip file includes the following:

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway installer
trans-unit.target: ATA Gateway installer

trans-unit.source: Configuration setting file with the required information to connect to the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Configuration setting file with the required information to connect to the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Update the ATA Gateways
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Update the ATA Gateways

trans-unit.source: On each ATA Gateway, extract the files from the ATA Gateway package and run the file **Microsoft ATA Gateway Setup.exe**.
trans-unit.target: On each ATA Gateway, extract the files from the ATA Gateway package and run the file **Microsoft ATA Gateway Setup.exe**.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this ATA Gateway package to install new ATA Gateways.
trans-unit.target: You can also use this ATA Gateway package to install new ATA Gateways.

trans-unit.source: Your previous settings will be preserved, but it may take a few minutes for the service to restart.
trans-unit.target: Your previous settings will be preserved, but it may take a few minutes for the service to restart.

trans-unit.source: Repeat this step for all other ATA Gateways deployed.
trans-unit.target: Repeat this step for all other ATA Gateways deployed.

trans-unit.source: After successfully updating an ATA Gateway, the outdated notification for the specific ATA Gateway will be resolved.
trans-unit.target: After successfully updating an ATA Gateway, the outdated notification for the specific ATA Gateway will be resolved.

trans-unit.source: You will know that all the ATA Gateways have been successfully updated when all the ATA Gateways report that they are successfully synced and the message that an updated ATA Gateway package is available is no longer displayed.
trans-unit.target: You will know that all the ATA Gateways have been successfully updated when all the ATA Gateways report that they are successfully synced and the message that an updated ATA Gateway package is available is no longer displayed.

trans-unit.source: Updated gateways image
trans-unit.target: Updated gateways image

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also

trans-unit.source: Check out the ATA forum!
trans-unit.target: Check out the ATA forum!
